description: Description of the Agricultural Tractor for sale
full_summary:
## Agricultural Tractor [PW-22-01010083]
### Request for Proposal
#### Solicitation Information
* Solicitation Number: 01R11-23-C061
* Closing Date: October 31, 2022, 16:00:00
* Publication Date: October 14, 2022
* Reference Number: PW-22-01010083

#### Tender Specifications
* The Government of Canada has a requirement for one (1) Agricultural Tractor.
* Delivery is expected on or before March 31, 2023.
* Suppliers must have a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangements (RFSA) SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT E60HS-18AGTR/A.

#### Contact Information
* Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* 1341 Baseline Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0C5, Canada
* Contact: Zack Flamont
* Telephone: (639) 560-3462
* Email: [zack.flamont@agr.gc.ca](mailto:zack.flamont@agr.gc.ca)

#### Bidder Information
* Suppliers can obtain a list of pre-qualified suppliers and registration instructions on the Buyandsell.gc.ca website.
* Suppliers are responsible for their own costs and obligations associated with the bid process.
* Debriefing sessions may be conducted after contract award.

#### Request for Proposal
* The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada invites qualified suppliers to submit a bid to provide one (1) Agricultural Tractor.
* The bid solicitation process is competitive and selective, and the lowest-priced bid will not necessarily be selected.
* The Supplier must meet the trade agreements and procurement requirements outlined in the Solicitation Document.

#### Notes
* A link to the bid documents and additional information will be made available on the Buyandsell.gc.ca website.
* Tenderers must respond to the solicitation in accordance with the instructions outlined in the Solicitation Document. 
**Please note that the tender closing date is October 31, 2022.** 
No bid submitted after this date will be accepted.
 
 Request for Proposal: [PW-22-01010083](link)


I  provide safe and timely delivery for one (1) Agricultural Tractor  to the Government of A Canada.

I look forward to fulfilling this request.
